html: years ago today, Garry Sobers made history by becoming the first cricketer to hit six sixes in an over. In 2007, #Laureus Ambassador @YUVSTRONG12 achieved the same feat for . Here, Yuvraj pays tribute to a pioneering moment in the history of his sport. pic.twitter.com/8r4RfAJ2x6
text:
years ago today, Garry Sobers made history by becoming the first cricketer to hit six sixes in an over. 

In 2007, #Laureus Ambassador @YUVSTRONG12 achieved the same feat for . 

Here, Yuvraj pays tribute to a pioneering moment in the history of his sport. pic.twitter.com/8r4RfAJ2x6
